#### Tender Description
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a provider of optometry services for its Matsqui and Pacific Institutions in British Columbia. The successful bidder will provide optometry services to inmates, as required, in accordance with the National Essential Health Services Framework and CSC's Health Services Policies and Guidelines. The contract period is from July 1, 2024, to June 30, 2025, with an option to renew for two additional one-year periods.
